thread.title: Hundreds take the Polar Bear Plunge at Pensacola Beach
thread.title_full: Hundreds take the Polar Bear Plunge at Pensacola Beach

author: - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Hundreds take the Polar Bear Plunge at Pensacola Beach
text: LOCALParadise Beach host the annual New Year's Day Polar Bar Plunge at Pensacola BeachHundreds brave the cold Santa Rosa Sound waters behind Paradise Bar and Grill on Pensacola Beach to participate in the annual New Year's Day Polar Bear Plunge on Monday, Jan 1, 2024.Tony Giberson/tgiberson@pnj.comSpectators gather to watch hundreds brave the cold Santa Rosa Sound waters behind Paradise Bar and Grill on Pensacola Beach during the annual New Year's Day Polar Bear Plunge on Monday, Jan 1, 2024.Tony Giberson/tgiberson@pnj.comHundreds brave the cold Santa Rosa Sound waters
